Make travel in China easy with Concur TripLink partners

Leverage our Ctrip and BlueSky integrations to automate T&E processes, reduce costs, and improve policy compliance for employees traveling in China.

Contact us Learn about Concur TripLink
Give travelers and finance teams the experiences they deserve

By integrating travel data from Ctrip Corporate Travel and TravelSky’s BlueSky product with SAP Concur, you can put pre-trip approvals, bookings, and reimbursements into a single workflow. That way, finance teams can get a fuller view of T&E while travelers enjoy hassle-free travel in China.

Streamline travel processes in China with BlueSky by TravelSky

BlueSky integrates with Concur TripLink to give businesses flexible booking options, more visibility into itineraries, and greater insight on purchases made while traveling in China. All of which can increase compliance, help capture invisible spend, provide oversight on your travel program, and more. 

Locate traveling employees and help keep them safe
Extend negotiated rates and policies to travel bookings in China
Provide employees with region-specific tools they’ll love

Get the brochure

Drive productivity, be more efficient, and track every dollar with Ctrip 

Businesses that use Ctrip Corporate Travel have saved up to 45% on the reimbursement process. Also, with increased visibility, businesses can track spending, plan for the future, and help employees be more productive. 

Easily compare budgeted T&E against actual spending
Automatically issue air tickets and hotel vouchers after travel requests are confirmed 
See travel details and prevent out-of-policy spending 
Make more-informed decisions about budgets, supplier negotiations, and duty of care

Get the brochure

See what these SAP Concur solutions can do for you
Concur TripLink
Bring outside bookings back into your managed-travel program and get more visibility into travel spend.
Learn about Concur TripLink
Travel partner integrations
Connect to our Concur TripLink supplier network that includes the biggest, most-recognizable names in travel.
Learn about TripLink partners
Concur Request
Simplify and speed up requests and approvals, drive policy compliance, and take control of company spend.
Learn about Concur Request
Contact us to learn more about SAP Concur solutions

To hear from an SAP Concur representative, please complete the form.
